name: SanNomedio
description:
This game was made for Meditations, a launcher that serves one minigame per day. More information on http://meditations.games/

Big thanks to Santiago Molina for letting me use his song Muiñeira de Poio in the game.

This is the description included in the Meditations launcher:
On this day, each year, I used to climb a mountain to join a local party with my grandad. He was my role model, and taught me to always try to be a better person. I learned from him that the actions of an individual make a difference in the life of other people. Helping other people makes us all stronger. I grew up and eventually moved to another country. The first year I missed that climb... was his first time missing it too, as he died a few days before. On this day, each year, my mind goes back to that mountain with him. He made a difference in my life for the better, and I try my best to follow his footsteps.

P.S: The game is shared as is. It's a small free project, and as such I can't give support or updates for it. Sorry about that!
